report.title: Filterable records by month and taxon group
report.description: Counts records by month broken down by species group, with standard params support.
report.query: select #columns# from generate_series(1,12) as months(no) left join (cache_occurrences o #agreements_join# #joins# AND #sharing_filter# #idlist# ) on date_part('month', o.date_start)=months.no

column.name: group_1
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.taxon_group_id=#group_1# then o.id else null end)

column.name: group_2
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.taxon_group_id=#group_2# then o.id else null end)

column.name: group_3
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.taxon_group_id=#group_3# then o.id else null end)

column.name: group_4
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.taxon_group_id=#group_4# then o.id else null end)

column.name: group_5
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.taxon_group_id=#group_5# then o.id else null end)

column.name: other
column.sql: count(distinct case when o.taxon_group_id not in (#group_1#,#group_2#,#group_3#,#group_4#,#group_5#) then o.id else null end)
